::Kup/Lord Elder::
   
  Kup was about to respond to Nightlight's plea to move Rodimus when Remus dropped.
   
  Kup: Elder, what happened?
   
  Elder: He's in stasis. He needs the energy of the Matrix to stabalize him.
   
  Kup: What? Why?
   
  Elder: It seems our friend is from the future. A being merged with the Matrix power it self if i understood him correctly.
   
  Kup: Well I'm sure we plan on doing something about te matrix but we need Rodimus back.
   
  Elder: If the medics do not arrive soon then we risk moving him and get him back to base.
   
  Elder opens a comm channel.
   
  Elder: Where are those medics?! Rodimus' situation isn't exactly good and Remus is down as well.

khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:
          
Remus was trying to explain all the serious of the situation, as he
spoke to Lord elder.

(ooc: I didn't put the pauses and the bad intonation of the last post
because it had a lot of texte but keep in mind that is word are cut
with some long pauses not necesseraly at the rigth time)

Remus : It will be hard to belive but I came from a long time to go. I
am from the future. (he voice was fading out as he speaked) I came
from a future. (ooc: The time period is the one after the Comic book
"Stormbringer" wich is happening maybe a thousand years after beast
machine)After a powerfull ennemy came and ravage Cybertron, one of the
escaped Autobots, Remus, began traveling the stars to find the Matrix
of that time. Against all odd, he finally found it. Has he was trying
to merged with it to give some chance of figthing the monster, he
realized that he could not win this war in this time with the help of
the Matrix. When he was seperated from Her, a part of the Matrix fuse
with his own spark creating Me. We cannot be awake at the same time,
so I controlled his drifting in the deep space to find his way trough
time and space until he crashed onto this planet were the Matrix
holder could help him in his quest. (the voice of Remus could barely
be heard) But now things have change and i'm draining a lot of energy
from Remus I do not know how much.....

Remus's body fell on the ground inert in a state similare to Rodimus. 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder nods to Remus and walks off a bit with him to talk.
> 
> Elder: What is it?
> 
> ::Jhiaxus-Hevn/Kup::
> 
> Hevn: I doubt that. They have what they wanted. Can we move him?
> 
> Kup: We don't want to risk it. Medics are on their way.
> 
> khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:
> When Remus joined up with Lord elder and the others, they
were all
> trying to save the fallen Rodimus. Has he landed Remus went meeting
> directly with Lord Elder.
> 
> Remus We.. neeD To... TaLk... AloNe. DoESn'T... HaVe.. Much... TimE...
> BEFORE... Remus... REtuRN.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::
> > 
> > Hevn: On my way, Nightlight.
> > 
> > Hevn triangulates the signal and transforms to beast mode. He
> takes off for the island.
> > 
> > Airshadow <airly2002@> wrote:
> > Hydras/Nightlight:
> > 
> > Hydras wonder what was happening that Jhiaxus was so happy.
> > 
> >
